'''Amy Larson''' is a pregnant woman whose husband was also married to [[Laura Larson]].

==History==
Amy came into the practice with her husband for an ultrasound because his other wife, Laura, was also pregnant and the baby was diagnosed with DiGeorge Syndrome and he was worried Amy's doctor had missed something. Addison did an ultrasound and confirmed that Amy's baby didn't have DiGeorge, but she was horrified that Daniel had two wives.

Addison brought the two women into the practice together and left them in a room together. They quickly figured out they were married to the same man. They were both angry, but Laura suggested that they work together, because they were both victims in the situation. When Amy went into labor, Laura held her hand while she gave birth. Laura also decided she wanted to keep the baby and Amy pledged to help her however she could. When Daniel returned after the baby was born, they asked him to leave.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
She has been married to [[Daniel Larson]] for 12 years. She was extremely upset when she learned he also had another wife.

===Familial===
She has two children, an older son and a newborn.

==Career==
She teaches third grade.
